actions.description: 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Slam

conditionImmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
damageImmunities: cold, lightning, poison; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak
name: Elise

specialTraits.description: Elise is immune to any spell or effect that would alter her form.
specialTraits.name: Immutable Form

specialTraits.description: Whenever Elise is subjected to lightning damage, she takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.
specialTraits.name: Lightning Absorption

specialTraits.description: Elise has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance
